about_the_game:
"Face the darkness of the past... and uncover the buried secrets."

Heritage invites you into an abandoned mansion shrouded in family tragedy and mystery. Set against the backdrop of a relentless storm with pounding rain and crackling lightning, this psychological horror game challenges you to uncover a chilling story piece by piece. Explore every shadowy corner, unlock hidden truths, and piece together the fragments of a haunting legacy.

This narrative-driven horror experience transports you to the mid-1970s, where forgotten memories and unsettling truths await. As you dive deeper, you’ll unravel secrets hidden behind locked doors, cryptic notes, and eerie silence.

What Awaits You:

  • A Terrifying Mansion: Illuminate dark rooms, dusty hallways, and forgotten spaces with your flashlight.

  • Psychological Tension and Deep Storytelling: Discover the hidden truth through letters, diaries, and mysterious notes.

  • Immersive Sound Design: Experience the chilling ambiance of rain, distant thunder, and oppressive silence.

  • Puzzles and Mysteries: Follow the clues, solve riddles, and unveil the mansion’s darkest secrets.

  • A Unique Atmosphere: Feel the ever-present tension of a dark, oppressive environment that keeps you on edge.

Heritage is a perfect choice for horror enthusiasts looking for a story-driven, atmospheric experience. With its gripping narrative, immersive environment, and exploration-driven gameplay, it promises hours of suspense and discovery.

Stay vigilant. Every room hides a secret. And the truth lies in the shadows of the past.
Can you reach the end of this story, or will the darkness consume you?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 10100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Gtx 1660
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 10100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Heritage is a psychological horror game where you dive into the dark secrets of a forgotten mansion. Explore shadowy rooms, solve puzzles, and uncover the hidden truth behind a family tragedy, all within a tense and eerie atmosphere.

English*, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Turkish
